name: backend
description: 1. login => add token 2. register => add account => add token 3. logout => remove token 4. addVocabulary => account list add vocabulary, if can not found, add vocabulary datebase, add vocabulary id 5. updateVocabulary => if can find in vocabulary datebase, update vocabulary id 6. deleteVocabulary => remove account vocabulary id 7. userInfo => query account
